newsitem.title: FRANCE: PRESS DIGEST - France - Le Monde April 1.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - France - Le Monde April 1.

text.p: These are leading stories in afternoon daily Le Monde.

-- Finance Minister Jean Arthuis says in an interview he expects earnings from privatisations in 1997 to be higher than forecast. He also proposes Treasury reform to improve the state's role as shareholder of state-owned companies.
-- Finance Ministry expects 2.3 percent economic growth for 1997, 2.7 percent in 1998.
-- Franco-Belgian group Dexia posts a 3.2 billion franc profit for 1996.
-- Glassmaker Saint Gobain to halve stake in Cie de Suez to around three percent.
-- Ground staff at Air France Europe strike without notice today to protest conditions of merger with Air France.
